ValidationRule.description: Several fields are required on Project Proposal before starting a Budget. In most cases they'll be provided before the user tries to start a Budget, but this rule is a final checker.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISBLANK(TEXT(I_RS_Project_Proposal__r.I_RS_Project_Start_Date__c)) || ISBLANK(TEXT(I_RS_Project_Proposal__r.I_RS_Project_End_Date__c)) || ISBLANK(TEXT(I_RS_Project_Proposal__r.I_RS_IP_Position__c)) ||
/*If Project Proposal IP position is as below, publishing rights is not required. Otherwise, it is.*/ ( TEXT(I_RS_Project_Proposal__r.I_RS_IP_Position__c) <> 'Owned by other organisation â€“ no rights to La Trobe to use' && ISBLANK(TEXT(I_RS_Project_Proposal__r.I_RS_Publishing_Rights__c)) )
